name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION, Appellee v. PPL GENERATION, LLC, and PPL Martins Creek, LLC, Appellees. Delaware Riverside Conservancy, Inc., Thomas and Nancy Shappell, and William Vogt, Intervenors-Appellants

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION, Appellee v. PPL GENERATION, LLC, and PPL Martins Creek, LLC, Appellees. Delaware Riverside Conservancy, Inc., Thomas and Nancy Shappell, and William Vogt, Intervenors-Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of June, 2013, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
68 A.3d 329
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION, Appellee v. PPL GENERATION, LLC, and PPL Martins Creek, LLC, Appellees. Delaware Riverside Conservancy, Inc., Thomas and Nancy Shappell, and William Vogt, Intervenors-Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 17, 2013.
